entry.dcterms:description: 1) satisfaction with the work of the government and opposition, satisfaction with democracy, subjective financial situation, economic expectations, popularity of politicians, party preferences, political self-categorization 2) trust in public institutions, public and civil organizations, branches of power, reputation and support of government measures 3) opinions about the necessity of social involvement in supporting those unable to pay utilities and general expenses, assumptions about who is responsible for problems in flat maintenance, state support of families having children, general costs associated with a flat, flat renovation, flat modernization in the past years 4) attitudes towards foreigners living in Hungary, opinions about foreigners settling down here, xenophobia, knowledge about and evaluation of the volume of immigration to Hungary, personal relationship with foreigners, proficiency in a foreign language 5) preference of car brands
